infos.value: So you will not let me pass?
Though I have yet to tell you where I am headed?
Perhaps you intend to prevent me from returning to Hourne Castle?
Dream up whatever story you wish.
Were I to say that I shall proceed with brute forceâ€¦?
Then I would not hesitate to fight back... Those are my orders.
If you intend to withdraw, I suggest you do so while you have the chance.
The main force of Hourne is broken! Your threats are empty!
...I see. At least I gave you fair warning.
My patience has reached its limit. You had best believe I will not be holding back!
